dataRoles.name: sampling
dataRoles.description: The level you wish to aggregate your measure data at, to prevent incorrect aggregation prior to plotting.

dataRoles.name: measure
dataRoles.description: The values you wish to observe in your violin plot for each category.

dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: The category that you wish to group your data into.

dataLimit.description:
Custom visuals have a typical limit of 30,000 rows. If you have more than this available to your data set, then this allows you to override the default limit at the cost of performance.

NOTE: reloads are costly and will trigger after any change. If you are making changes to your visual, then it's recommended that you turn these options off while doing that and then back on when you're finished.

override.description:
Allow loading of additional data from the model to the visual, if it is available.

Note that Power BI still may not be able to supply all data, depending on memory constraints.

showInfo.description: Display information and explanation when fetching more data from the model if the row limit is exceeded.

showCustomVisualNotes.description:
Display information about the custom visual limitations and recommendations for end users.

This option allows you to turn this info off for end-users if you feel it is not relevant to them.

violin.description: Configure how the violin is displayed in your chart.

innerPadding.description: Amount of padding to apply from the edge of the series.

strokeWidth.description: Width of the lines bordering the violin plot.

resolution.description: Specify how densely the data should be sampled when calculating its distribution.

kernel.description: The kernel function to use when calculating density estimation.

specifyBandwidth.description:
If disabled, this will automatically estimate the "rule-of-thumb" KDE bandwidth.

Enable this to manually specify your own value(s).

bandwidth.description:
Manually provided KDE bandwidth value to apply to all data.

If using Bandwidth By Category, then this will serve as the default for all categories that don't have a bandwidth explicitly set.

bandwidthByCategory.description:
If disabled, the same KDE bandwidth value will be applied across all categories.

If enabled, the bandwidth will be estimated or can be specified for each category, as applicable.

categoryBandwidth.description:
Specified bandwidth value for this category.

If this has not been explicitly set, then this will inherit from the Bandwidth value above.

To revert to the default value (if you have already specified it), then clear the field value and it will be replaced with the Bandwidth value.

sorting.description: Sorting options for the violin plot.

by.description: Specify how to sort the categories in the visual.

defaultFillColour.description: Color to apply to all categories in the chart.

transparency.description: Level of transparency to apply to the violin fill.

categoryFillColour.description: Fill color for this particular category.

colourByCategory.description: Apply specific fill color to invididual categories.

dataPoints.description: Provides an accompanying plot to the violin.

plotType.description:
The type of combo plot to display:

 - Box shows distribution of data using a box and whisker plot.
 - Barcode shows a plot of individal data points, using a consistant width.

strokeWidth.description: Width of the lines used in the selected combo plot.

boxFillColour.description: Fill color to apply to the box plot.

barColour.description: Color to apply to the data bars in the combo plot.

transparency.description: Level of transparency to apply to the combo plot fill.

innerPadding.description: Amount of padding to apply from the edge of the violin.

showWhiskers.description: Show the 5% - 95% confidence interval (whiskers) on the box plot.

showQuartiles.description: Show 1st & 3rd quartiles, as lines on the diagram.

quartile1FillColour.description: Color to apply to the 1st quartile line in the combo plot.

quartile1StrokeWidth.description: Width of the 1st quartile line in the combo plot.

quartile1StrokeLineStyle.description: The style to apply to the 1st quartile line in the combo plot.

quartile3FillColour.description: Color to apply to the 3rd quartile line in the combo plot.

quartile3StrokeWidth.description: Width of the 3rd quartile line in the combo plot.

quartile3StrokeLineStyle.description: The style to apply to the 3rd quartile line in the combo plot.

showMedian.description: Show the median, as a line across the box plot.

medianFillColour.description: Color to apply to the median line.

medianStrokeLineStyle.description: Style to apply to the median line.

showMean.description: Show the mean, as a circle in the box.

meanStrokeWidth.description: Width of the lines used when displaying the mean.

meanFillColour.description: The color to apply to the mean indicator.

meanFillColourInner.description: The inner color to apply to the mean indicator.

enumeration.value: "Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

tooltip.description: If using the standard tooltip, you can customise the display of data points in this menu.

numberSamplesDisplayUnits.description: Display unit formatting to apply to the # Samples tooltip data point.

numberSamplesPrecision.description: If using display units for the # Samples data point, you can use to modify the number of decimal places.

measureDisplayUnits.description: Display units to apply to data points utilising the Measure Data.

measurePrecision.description: If using display units for the Measure Data, you can use to modify the number of decimal places.

showMaxMin.description: Show the series maximum and minimum values on the tooltip.

showSpan.description: Show the series span value (range) from minimum to maximum on the tooltip.

showMedian.description: Show the series median value on the tooltip.

showMean.description: Show the series mean value on the tooltip.

showDeviation.description: Show the series standard deviation value on the tooltip.

showQuartiles.description: Show the series upper and lower quartile values on the tooltip.

showIqr.description: Show the series inter quartile range value on the tooltip.

showConfidence.description: Show the series confindence values (or whisker values) on the tooltip.

showBandwidth.description: Show the bandwidth value applied to the series - used to calculate the violin line.

position.description: Select the location for the legend.
